value.title: StarCraft 2: The Honorable MACRO PROTOSS! (Reynor vs ShoWTimE)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of top level European StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Zerg) and ShoWTimE (Protoss). The new patch has made Zerg versus Protoss a far more interesting matchup. Reynor has always been mid-game focused, but how does ShoWTimE deal with the change in the meta?  ShoWTimE on Twitter: https://twitter.com/showtimesc2

value.title: StarCraft 2: The World Championship GRAND FINALS! (Best-of-7)
value.excerpt: Serral versus Reynor in a best-of-7 series of top level StarCraft 2. This series is the Grand Finals of IEM Katowice, and with that the finals of the World Championships. The winner of this match is the current World Champion of StarCraft 2.  IEM Katowice 2022 on Liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/starcraft2/IEM_Katowice/2022

value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's 100 PROBE Economy! (Skillous vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Professional game of StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Protoss) and Skillous (Protoss). In this long game of PvP we watch two pro players play a wildly different style. Skillous tries to max out with Carriers, Archons and a Mothership, whereas Reynor puts a heavy focus on Zealots, Stalkers and Dark Templar.

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
